TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FileLogger extends Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger

Docs.summary: Extends the to log messages to a file rather than the console window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The FileLogger writes messages to a file in exactly the same format as the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger> writes messages to the console window.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example creates an <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine> object and uses the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine.BuildProjectFile%2A> method to build a project file. The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.FileLogger> class is used to log information to a file.
[!code-vb[msbuild_BuildAProject#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/BuildAProjectVB/Module1.vb#1)] [!code-cs[msbuild_BuildAProject#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/BuildAProjectCS/Program.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource eventSource) cil managed

Docs.param: The to register with the logger.
Docs.summary: Registers the logger for the specified events.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Initialize (Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource eventSource, int nodeCount);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource eventSource, int32 nodeCount) cil managed

Docs.param: The to register with the logger.
An integer representing the node ID for the event source.
Docs.summary: Registers the logger for the specified events.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Shutdown() cil managed

Docs.summary: Stops the logger, releases all resources, and closes the file to which the logger was writing.
